meanings.definition: A microphone designed to be used underwater.
meanings.sent1: The hydrophone picked up the sounds of whales singing in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use a hydrophone to listen to the sounds of marine life deep in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The hydrophone seemed to be eavesdropping on the conversation of the fish below.
meanings.sent4: The hydrophone acted like a secret agent, capturing the underwater chatter.
meanings.sent5: The hydrophone's job is to capture the mysterious melodies of the deep sea creatures.

meanings.definition: An instrument used to detect sound underwater.
meanings.sent1: The hydrophone helped the researchers hear the distant rumble of a passing submarine.
meanings.sent2: Divers rely on a hydrophone to listen for any approaching marine life.
meanings.sent3: The hydrophone detected the sneaky whispers of the hidden underwater creatures.
meanings.sent4: Like a magical ear, the hydrophone revealed the secrets of the ocean depths.
meanings.sent5: The hydrophone's sensitive ears captured the symphony of the underwater world.
